### UBC Climate Station on Totem Field
<ul>
  <li> Access to <a href="http://137.82.254.122/DataExport.aspx">custom data download</a> of standard measured meteorological observations (air temperature, humidity, precipitation, soil temperatures, solar irradiance, wind) measured since 1958. Data can be downloaded in .csv format. </li>
</ul>

## Code and Documentation
Our <a href="https://github.com/ubc-micromet">lab github</a> hosts code for flux processing, README docs for our lab, and various other bits of information.

More documentation related to maintenance procedures for our sites can be found <a href="https://ubc-micromet.github.io/Documentation.html">here</a>.

## Data Download
### Currently Operational Sites
<ul>
  <li>Data from <a href="https://ameriflux.lbl.gov/sites/siteinfo/CA-DBB">CA-DBB</a> can be downloaded from AmeriFlux. Data from the web plots are available <a href="https://ibis.geog.ubc.ca/~micromet/webdata/resources/csv/">here</a> (prefix BB. note that this is raw data – no filtering or QCQA. Database codes are available <a href="https://ibis.geog.ubc.ca/~micromet/research/Burns-Bog/Database/BB.html">here</a>).</li>
  
  <li>Data from <a href="https://ameriflux.lbl.gov/sites/siteinfo/CA-DB2">CA-DB2</a> will soon be available on AmeriFlux. Data from the web plots are available <a href="https://ibis.geog.ubc.ca/~micromet/webdata/resources/csv/">here</a> (prefix BB2. note that this is raw data – no filtering or QCQA. Database codes are available <a href="https://ibis.geog.ubc.ca/~micromet/research/Burns-Bog/Database/BB.html">here</a>).</li>
  
  <li>Data from CA-DSM will soon be available on AmeriFlux. Data from the web plots are available <a href="https://ibis.geog.ubc.ca/~micromet/webdata/resources/csv/">here</a> (prefix DSM. note that this is raw data – no filtering or QCQA).</li>
  
  <li>Data from CA-RBM will soon be available on AmeriFlux. Data from the web plots are available <a href="https://ibis.geog.ubc.ca/~micromet/data/RichmondBrackishMarsh.html#">here</a> (prefix RBM. note that this is raw data – no filtering or QCQA).</li>
  
  <li>UBC Climate Station on Totem Field – Access to <a href="http://137.82.254.122/DataExport.aspx">custom data download</a> of standard measured meteorological observations (air temperature, humidity, precipitation, soil temperatures, solar irradiance, wind) measured since 1958. Data can be downloaded in .csv format.</li>
</ul>

*A map of our field sites can be found <a href="https://ubc-micromet.github.io/FieldSiteMaps/">here</a>.*
